plot: A married couple are illegally working in the USA. They get separated when immigration discovers them. Each one does what they can to survive.
title: La tumba del mojado
plot_es: A married couple are illegally working in the USA. They get separated when immigration discovers them. Each one does what they can to survive.
plot_en: A married couple are illegally working in the USA. They get separated when immigration discovers them. Each one does what they can to survive.
